title: SMC_TRAFOV_Gantry3 (FunctionBlock)
text:
FUNCTION_BLOCK SMC_TRAFOV_Gantry3
Reverse transformation for three-dimensional portal systems.
It takes into account the path velocity and path direction
as control variables for the axis.

rows.Name: pi
rows.Comment: Target position vector (x,y), output of interpolator.

rows: Vector of the current tangent, output of interpolator

rows.Name: dx
rows.Comment: Resulting target position for the x-axis

rows: Resulting target velocity for the x-axis
Resulting target position for the y-axis
Resulting target velocity for the y-axis
Resulting target position for the z-axis
Resulting target velocity for the z-axis.
